description:
As a Technical Solutions Consultant, you will help refine and grow the capabilities of current systems, driving continuous improvement to meet our engineering needs. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and sustaining product lifecycle management (PLM) related application systems, developed primarily using Teamcenter PLM and Development and Integration. In this role, you will also promote best practices and internal business processes. You will be responsive and able to adapt quickly succeed within an open collaborative peer environment. You will work in a data driven environment, have a desire to drive change, and long for the opportunity to analyze systematic issues and implement solutions to challenging problems.


Google's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our Hardware team researches, designs, and develops new technologies and hardware to make our user's interaction with computing faster, more powerful, and seamless. Whether finding new ways to capture and sense the world around us, advancing form factors, or improving interaction methods, our Hardware team is making people's lives better through technology.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • 5 years of experience with Teamcenter.
  • Experience in end-user support of Teamcenter (v10.1.x/11.1.x), multi-CAD Integrations, and Product Data exchange management within production environment Workflows, NX-Manager, Bill of Material, Bill of Process, revision rules, workflows, and access management.
  • Experience troubleshooting and providing solutions.
  • Experience with data flows in the Teamcenter security environment and resolving data input/output requests.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science.
  • Experience in Active Workspace and Weblogic administration.
  • Understanding of installation, configuration, and patching of Teamcenter server and client components, data model (BMIDE) updates, and additional integrations.
  • Ability to keep all parties informed and engage, demonstrating excellent communication skills.
  • Excellent analytical and logical skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent people and customer service skills.
responsibilities:
• Provide real-time technical support and knowledge transfer to the user community members of Computer Aided Design (CAD) and Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) tools (Siemens NX (UG), Teamcenter and Visualization Mock-Up).
  • Contribute excellent Teamcenter PLM configuration and customization implementation skills, support acceptance testing for customizations and application releases for American region, and coordinate the resolution of product issues with software vendors.
  • Be passionate about face-to-face training backed by a vast degree of knowledge and experience in CAD/PDM/PLM software, Vehicle Design/Release/Corporate Standards and a broad array of Associated Cross-Functional Product Development (VPD) Processes. Support users located at various sites across the United States, Taipei, and India.
  • Collaborate with the PLM development team to support deploying new releases of Teamcenter and NX at server and client levels.
  • Ensure that problems are properly captured and solutions provided in a timely manner.
title: Technical Solutions Consultant, Team Center
